briefTitle: VIR-7831 for the Early Treatment of COVID-19 in Outpatients
officialTitle: A Phase II/III Randomized, Multi-center, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of Monoclonal Antibody VIR-7831 for the Early Treatment of Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) in Non-hospitalized Patients
summary: This is a phase 2/3 study in which subjects with coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) will receive VIR-7831 or placebo and will be assessed for safety, tolerability, efficacy, and pharmacokinetics.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants Who Had Progression of COVID-19 Through Day 29
